items.sentence: Tom told everyone that he\'d passed the exam.
Tom told me about everything that he\'d seen.
I don\'t intend to do what Tom told me to do.
I don\'t know how long the concert will last.
I don\'t know how you did it, but you did it.
I don\'t know if I should believe Tom or not.
There was no one in the mine when it blew up.
There was something weird about the incident.
There were a lot of people in the park today.
Maybe Tom should pay more attention in class.
Maybe Tom was the one who stole your bicycle.
Maybe you should have a little talk with Tom.
Most signs around here are written in French.
Tom has something he can\'t wait to show you.
Would you mind if I record this conversation?
Would you mind leaving me alone for a minute?
You shouldn\'t take those things for granted.
You thanked Tom for the present, didn\'t you?
You\'re a lot more beautiful than I remember.
Don\'t worry. Someone will come to rescue us.
